userStories.title: Create build extraction script
acceptanceCriteria: Create extract_builds.py that parses HTML files
Extract: year, make (always Ford), model, package from og:title
Generate build_id from URL using build_id_generator.py
Output to builds.json with schema compliance
userStories.notes: Created extract_builds.py with og:title parsing, package detection for Stage 1-3, NITEMARE, TRAKPAK, etc.

userStories.title: Execute build extraction for all HTML files
acceptanceCriteria: Extract builds from all 59 HTML files
userStories.notes: 59/59 builds extracted. Models: Mustang (23), F-150 (20), Super Duty (8), Raptor (4), Ranger (3), Slingshot (1).

userStories.title: Update sources.json and verify completion
acceptanceCriteria: Mark stage complete if all builds extracted
userStories.notes: Updated sources.json: builds=59. Ready for Stage 4 (Mod Extraction).
